topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bd8c556368723386d50f00#post_54bd8c556368723386d50f00
You mean you're no different than 80% of NFL fans?

Because all I'm hearing from _anyone_ is "now the Seahawks bandwagon won't shut up" or "now the Patriots fans won't shut up" or "I hate both teams because of how popular they are" or "the NFL has gone to crap" or "that Seahawks vs Packers game was terrible" or "the Patriots win everything, they don't deserve to be in the Super Bowl"

Honestly, I'm just watching the games for the entertainment value. Call me a bandwagoner, but I'm all for the Seahawks to win again. I'm just starting off as an NFL fan, I need teams to like other than just the Cardinals or the Bears.

I'm just watching for fun dammit, I don't want to see things like "this":http://imgur.com/gallery/btYDvK1
